texts: By closing your London Road User Charging account you will also close services such as discounts or Auto Pay.
If you have a residents' discount and have paid future charges you will no longer be entitled to pay at the discounted rate and all discounted charges will be refunded.
To see active services go to My account .
You are about to close your London Road User Charging account and all related services.
Closing your account is permanent and can't be undone.
There is an outstanding balance of {0} on your Auto Pay. You can't close your London Road User Charging account until this balance has been paid.
